twc_daily.narrative: Clouds early, some clearing late. Lows overnight in the upper 70s.
Thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. Highs in the mid 90s and lows in the mid 70s.
Thunderstorms. Potential for heavy rainfall. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the mid 70s.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 77. Northwest wind around 0 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws_periods.name: Wednesday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 97, with temperatures falling to around 90 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 109. North wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 75. East wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.
